HeroSection.title: Your Trusted Destination for Quality Spare Parts
HeroSection.description: Discover a wide selection of OEM and aftermarket parts for all vehicle types. Genuine quality, competitive prices, and reliable performance guaranteed. Shop with confidence and keep your ride running smoothly.

HomeAbout.p1: At Pandi Auto Spare, we specialize in providing high-quality spare parts for cars. Whether you're a vehicle owner, mechanic, or retailer, we ensure access to a wide range of OEM and premium aftermarket parts that meet industry standards.
HomeAbout.p2: With a focus on genuine quality, competitive pricing, and fast delivery, our goal is to keep your vehicles running safely and smoothly. From engines to accessories, our inventory is backed by expert support and a commitment to customer satisfaction.

HomeProduct.p1: Browse our wide range of high-quality spare parts designed to fit perfectly and perform reliably. Whether you’re upgrading, replacing, or repairing — we’ve got the right part for you.

HomeBrand.p1: Browse our wide range of high-quality spare parts designed to fit perfectly and perform reliably. Whether you’re upgrading, replacing, or repairing — we’ve got the right part for you

HeroSection.description: Welcome to pandi Auto spare, your one-stop destination for high-quality spare parts for all types of vehicles. From everyday commuters to heavy-duty machines, we provide reliable solutions to keep you moving with confidence.

MissionSection.subtitle1: We re a team of auto enthusiasts and professionals with a passion for performance and precision. With years of industry experience, we understand the importance of using the right part — which is why we only offer products that meet strict standards of quality, durability, and fit.
MissionSection.subtitle2: To make spare part buying easy, reliable, and accessible for every customer — whether you’re a car owner, a mechanic, or a shop owner. We aim to build long-term relationships based on honesty, quality, and service excellence.

offerList.title: OEM & Aftermarket Parts
offerList.description: We supply genuine Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) parts along with trusted aftermarket alternatives for all major brands and vehicle types.

offerList.title: Wide Product Range
offerList.description: From engine components to electrical systems, filters, brakes, body parts, accessories, and more — we’ve got everything under one roof.

offerList.title: Trusted Brands
offerList.description: We work with renowned brands like Bosch, NGK, TVS, Castrol, Exide, Minda, and many more.

offerList.title: Affordable Prices
offerList.description: Competitive pricing without compromising on quality. We believe great parts shouldn’t break the bank.

offerList.title: Fast Delivery & Support
offerList.description: Timely shipping, easy returns, and dedicated customer service to assist you every step of the way.

offerList.title: Easy Part Search & Filtering
offerList.description: Our user-friendly website makes it simple to search, filter, and find the exact part you need — by vehicle model, brand, category, or part number.
